bwwExcerpt: The lighting gave the show an extra layer of depth. It added an extra touch of magic, making the junkyard of the Jellicle Cats look like a fantasy wonderland. The lights themselves were a show, but they worked in perfect unison with the movement of the dancers and with the emotions of each scene. I'm sure the woman with the binoculars sitting three rows in front of me would agree when I say that "CATS" has amazing choreography, magical lighting, powerful voices, and goosebump performances, provi
